# TaskFlow - Documentation Index

**Project:** TaskFlow - Task & Maintenance Management System
**Generated:** 2025-12-31
**Generated By:** BMad Master - Document Project Workflow (Exhaustive Scan)

---

## Overview

TaskFlow adalah sistem manajemen terintegrasi yang menggabungkan:
- **Task Management** - Kanban, Sprint, Epic, Timeline
- **Maintenance Management** - Work Orders, Preventive Maintenance, Downtime
- **Production Management** - Jadwal Produksi, OEE, KPI
- **AI Integration** - Chatbot, Smart Assign, Writing Assistant

---

---

## Quick Reference

### Running the Project

```bash
# From root
npm run dev        # Both client (3000) + server (5000)
npm run server     # Server only
npm run client     # Client only
```

### Default Credentials

| User | Email | Password |
|------|-------|----------|
| Admin | admin@taskmanager.com | admin123 |
| Sample | john@taskmanager.com | password123 |

### Technology Stack

**Frontend:** React 18 + Vite + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS
**Backend:** Express + TypeScript + SQLite (sql.js)
**AI:** OpenAI GPT

### Key Endpoints

| Resource | Base Path |
|----------|-----------|
| Auth | `/api/auth` |
| Tickets | `/api/tickets` |
| Work Orders | `/api/work-orders` |
| Assets | `/api/assets` |
| Downtime | `/api/downtime` |
| Maintenance | `/api/maintenance` |
| Reports | `/api/reports` |
| AI | `/api/ai` |

---

## Project Structure

```
projectSAP/
├── task-manager-client/          # React Frontend
│   ├── src/
│   │   ├── components/           # Reusable components
│   │   ├── pages/                # Page components
│   │   ├── context/              # React Context providers
│   │   ├── services/             # API service layer
│   │   └── types/                # TypeScript interfaces
│   └── package.json
│
├── task-manager-server/          # Node.js Backend
│   ├── src/
│   │   ├── controllers/          # Request handlers
│   │   ├── services/             # Business logic
│   │   ├── models/               # Data access (repositories)
│   │   ├── routes/               # API routes
│   │   ├── middleware/           # Auth, validation
│   │   ├── database/             # DB setup, migrations
│   │   └── types/                # TypeScript interfaces
│   ├── data/                     # SQLite database file
│   └── package.json
│
├── docs/                         # Project documentation
├── _bmad/                        # BMad Method resources
└── _bmad-output/                 # Generated documentation
```

---

## Feature Summary

### Task Management
- [x] Ticket CRUD with types (bug, task, story, epic)
- [x] Kanban board with drag-and-drop
- [x] Sprint management
- [x] Epic grouping
- [x] Timeline/Gantt view
- [x] Multi-assignee support
- [x] Comments and attachments
- [x] Notifications

### Maintenance Management
- [x] Asset registry with categories
- [x] Work Order lifecycle management
- [x] Preventive Maintenance scheduling
- [x] PM loop generation (recurring schedules)
- [x] Failure code classification
- [x] Work Order ↔ Ticket integration

### Downtime Tracking
- [x] Real-time downtime logging
- [x] Downtime classifications
- [x] Production schedule awareness
- [x] Quick action buttons
- [x] Auto-link PM to downtime

### Production Management
- [x] Shift pattern configuration
- [x] Production calendar
- [x] Status types (scheduled, maintenance_window, etc.)
- [x] Bulk schedule creation

### Reports & KPIs
- [x] Dashboard statistics
- [x] MTBF, MTTR, Availability
- [x] PM Compliance rate
- [x] OEE calculation
- [x] Technician performance
- [x] Downtime analysis by category

### AI Features
- [x] Conversational chatbot
- [x] Smart assignee suggestions
- [x] Writing assistant
- [x] Text formatting
- [x] Function calling (tool use)
- [x] Persistent conversation memory

---

## Integration Points

```
┌─────────────┐         ┌─────────────┐
│   Ticket    │────────▶│ Work Order  │
│             │◀────────│             │
└─────────────┘         └──────┬──────┘
                               │
                               ▼
                        ┌─────────────┐
                        │   Asset     │
                        └──────┬──────┘
                               │
        ┌──────────────────────┼──────────────────────┐
        │                      │                      │
        ▼                      ▼                      ▼
┌─────────────┐         ┌─────────────┐       ┌─────────────┐
│  Downtime   │         │ Maintenance │       │ Production  │
│    Logs     │         │  Schedules  │       │  Schedule   │
└─────────────┘         └─────────────┘       └─────────────┘
```
